FuncDef: The set system next-work-mode command configures the system working mode. The set system next-work-mode command configures the system working mode. By default, the device starts in low-latency mode.

ParaDef.Info:
The system works in common forwarding mode.
-

The system works in low-delay mode.
-

Examples: Warning: The setting will take effect after the system reboots. Ensure that the next startup mode is supported by the board. Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: The device can work in low-latency mode or common forwarding mode. You can manually configure the next working mode by running commands.
